release.name: Release 3.9.0
release.body:
## [3.9.0](https://github.com/launchgood/launchgood/compare/3.8.2...3.9.0) (2021-12-08)


### Features

* account owner labelling for old account ([23430ae](https://github.com/launchgood/launchgood/commit/23430ae48268dad4b6b7042bb09e4e985772c82c)), closes [#2196](https://github.com/launchgood/launchgood/issues/2196)
* added feedback form ([d838e38](https://github.com/launchgood/launchgood/commit/d838e3869ed0d8abe6796220d5fbc2481e90a216))
* **Campaign:** new campaign creation ([8d4d553](https://github.com/launchgood/launchgood/commit/8d4d553ab84f26e8401de21c304f5ef33bd4904a)), closes [#2963](https://github.com/launchgood/launchgood/issues/2963)
* **Campaign:** shortcut link to beta campaign creation for repeat cc on start project page ([fb9709f](https://github.com/launchgood/launchgood/commit/fb9709fb9dd6a996d25fb67a178d17aba10b3a8c)), closes [#2963](https://github.com/launchgood/launchgood/issues/2963)
* **compliance:** added validation description for payout account info ([a9ac012](https://github.com/launchgood/launchgood/commit/a9ac0127c450378ca8f09a85773ab23a240e51ad)), closes [#2901](https://github.com/launchgood/launchgood/issues/2901)
* new terms and conditions page on step 4 ([d824e97](https://github.com/launchgood/launchgood/commit/d824e97ef225d7d250bf99af7d8708c624fc2b31))


### Bug Fixes

* change to new text editor ([5dafed8](https://github.com/launchgood/launchgood/commit/5dafed88254d073d40c5b4a8373dc1451ac8ebba))
* incorrect  wordings on step 1 page ([19c579c](https://github.com/launchgood/launchgood/commit/19c579cb4c6ed8c9fc760d1b98edd4b34c4b84f0))
* make patronicity campaign creation require more fields before submission ([5387c7c](https://github.com/launchgood/launchgood/commit/5387c7c956a20dcb802870a0eb03952b188fa8cf))
* next button disabled glitch on zakat input ([420d749](https://github.com/launchgood/launchgood/commit/420d749a7ca87f161712899ae4ebeb9702bfafc1))
* project bar not loading after submitting project ([19ce4b0](https://github.com/launchgood/launchgood/commit/19ce4b07f868248dff026d45c2bfe97278ebddb5)), closes [#2963](https://github.com/launchgood/launchgood/issues/2963)
* urgent submission button ([8a71c90](https://github.com/launchgood/launchgood/commit/8a71c906caa0fdf281cdccde5a2276b3a8abc9bd)), closes [#2963](https://github.com/launchgood/launchgood/issues/2963)


### Code Quality

* fixes according to php-cs-fixer rules ([788a1fb](https://github.com/launchgood/launchgood/commit/788a1fb72ebc2f245b23359012073072ef39a6a7))
* fixes according to php-cs-fixer rules ([17e55fa](https://github.com/launchgood/launchgood/commit/17e55faf61da739ea222e01973b7b7f52cc3d8f0))
* fixes according to php-cs-fixer rules ([1cf7936](https://github.com/launchgood/launchgood/commit/1cf79362b61d55ae37f9103ad5f9f0201e778027))
* fixes according to php-cs-fixer rules ([c21a9db](https://github.com/launchgood/launchgood/commit/c21a9dbc2079b4468076829ce18a3ee0f79eaa98))
* fixes according to php-cs-fixer rules ([a2328b8](https://github.com/launchgood/launchgood/commit/a2328b808b395f0ca4358b772a90d58cefc05192))
* fixes according to php-cs-fixer rules ([4c56cf3](https://github.com/launchgood/launchgood/commit/4c56cf32a840cec682966c4adc33380d5d74bfe6))


### Chores & Other Changes

* disable level 3 check ([1cc708d](https://github.com/launchgood/launchgood/commit/1cc708d0e3e947333e0a2ae7bb4371a290a4d7bc))
* disable onbehalf for iteration 1 of campaign creation ([f249c0e](https://github.com/launchgood/launchgood/commit/f249c0ed67a4036448b201174919b85d19239edd))
* temporary change of wording from myself to myself or someone else ([c6ef201](https://github.com/launchgood/launchgood/commit/c6ef20167351855af4d4611cd6e83fd734a733cd))


### Code Refactoring

* change country column type and bump migration version ([913081b](https://github.com/launchgood/launchgood/commit/913081b70cfa451fa39a133d77b782c1de3c9723))
* moved terms and conditions popup to step4 ([4f6a28a](https://github.com/launchgood/launchgood/commit/4f6a28aa091b2f7eb5dadd8d0b0e1069e13dbb83)), closes [#2963](https://github.com/launchgood/launchgood/issues/2963)
* saving on behalf account details to bank account ([3b5b911](https://github.com/launchgood/launchgood/commit/3b5b91143cde852fc664cf3244122689f56c1880)), closes [#2963](https://github.com/launchgood/launchgood/issues/2963)
* small cleanup for campaign creation code ([915f8f0](https://github.com/launchgood/launchgood/commit/915f8f07d1a988fdfd18a763b6b8c0180cf27b95))
* visibility of url for new campaign creation flow is limited to level 1 repeat CC ([2d9bbc8](https://github.com/launchgood/launchgood/commit/2d9bbc8be6799d34db7bb549d29099f44fc27142)), closes [#2963](https://github.com/launchgood/launchgood/issues/2963)
